articles.title: European firms ‘not benefiting’ from China’s US$1.8 trillion Greater Bay Area - South China Morning Post
articles.description: European Union Chamber of Commerce in China survey showed less than half of the firms expressed optimism for the Greater Bay Area, which had an economy of 13 trillion yuan (US$1.8 trillion) last year.
